caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT, v. DARRYL K. THREAT, APPELLANT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied May 29, 1990.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM CIRCUIT COURT OF JACKSON COUNTY, TIMOTHY D. O'LEARY, JUDGE.Page 6
opinion.attorneys:
James F. Speck, Kansas City, for appellant.
William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Robert P. Sass, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before KENNEDY, P.J., and LOWENSTEIN and BERREY, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER
[1] Appeal from conviction of possession of a controlled substance, ยง 195.020, RSMo 1986, and sentence of six years imprisonment.
[2] Affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
